name: @wox-launcher/wox-plugin
description: All nodejs plugin for Wox should use types in this package

scripts.clean: node -e "var { rmdirSync, existsSync } = require('fs'), path = require('path'); ['./dist'].forEach(fPath => {if (existsSync(path.join(__dirname, fPath))) rmdirSync(path.join(__dirname, fPath), { recursive: true })}); process.exit(0);"
scripts.pub: pnpm build && pnpm version patch && pnpm publish --no-git-checks --access public
